mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY ( PAYER_ID , ORD_NO , PAY_STUS , PAY_TP , ORD_AMT , DLV_FEE , CPN_ISS_NO , ORGN_PAY_AMT , PNT_USE_AMT , REAL_PAY_AMT , REGR_ID) SELECT #{payerId} # 결제자아이디 , #{ordNo} # 주문번호 , 10 # 결제상태(10 = 결제완료) , #{payTp} # 결제수단 , O.ORD_AMT # 주문금액 , IF(O.ORD_AMT >= 50000, 0, 3000) # 배송비 , #{cpnIssNo} # 쿠폰발행번호 , GET_ORGN_PAY_AMT(O.ORD_AMT, #{cpnIssNo}) + IF(O.ORD_AMT >= 50000, 0, 3000) # 원결제금액(주문금액에서 쿠폰할인 적용 + 배송비) , #{pntUseAmt} # 포인트사용금액 , GET_ORGN_PAY_AMT(O.ORD_AMT, #{cpnIssNo}) + IF(O.ORD_AMT >= 50000, 0, 3000) - #{pntUseAmt} # 실결제금액(원결제금액 + 배송비 - 포인트 사용금액) , #{regrId} # 등록자아이디 FROM (SELECT SUM(GET_DC_PRC(PROD_PRC, PROD_DC_PER) * QTY) AS ORD_AMT FROM ORD_DTL WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo}) O

INSERT INTO PAY ( PAYER_ID , ORD_NO , PAY_STUS , PAY_TP , ORD_AMT , DLV_FEE , CPN_ISS_NO , ORGN_PAY_AMT , PNT_USE_AMT , REAL_PAY_AMT , REGR_ID) SELECT A.PAYER_ID # 결제자아이디 , A.ORD_NO # 주문번호 , A.PAY_STUS # 결제상태 , A.PAY_TP # 결제수단 , A.TOT_PROD_AMT # 주문금액 , A.DLV_FEE # 배송비 , A.CPN_ISS_NO # 쿠폰발행번호 , A.ORGN_PAY_AMT # 원결제금액 , A.PNT_USE_AMT # 포인트사용금액 , A.ORGN_PAY_AMT - A.PNT_USE_AMT AS REAL_PAY_AMT # 실결제금액 , #{regrId} # 등록자 FROM (SELECT P.PAYER_ID , P.ORD_NO , P.PAY_STUS , P.PAY_TP , OD.TOT_PROD_AMT # 주문금액 , IF(OD.TOT_PROD_AMT > 50000, 0, 3000) AS DLV_FEE , P.CPN_ISS_NO , GET_ORGN_PAY_AMT(OD.TOT_PROD_AMT, P.CPN_ISS_NO) + IF(OD.TOT_PROD_AMT > 50000, 0, 3000) AS ORGN_PAY_AMT , P.PNT_USE_AMT - (SELECT RFND_PNT FROM ORD_CLAIM WHERE ORD_CLAIM_NO = (SELECT MAX(ORD_CLAIM_NO) FROM ORD_CLAIM WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo})) AS PNT_USE_AMT FROM (SELECT SUM(GET_DC_PRC(OD.PROD_PRC, OD.PROD_DC_PER) * OD.QTY) AS TOT_PROD_AMT # 상품별 총 결제금액 구하기 , OD.ORD_NO # 주문번호 FROM ORD_DTL OD WHERE OD.ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND OD.ORD_STUS NOT IN (70, 80, 90) # 70(주문취소), 80(반품), 90(교환) ) OD JOIN PAY P ON OD.ORD_NO = P.ORD_NO WHERE P.PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30) # 20(결제부분취소), 30(결제취소) ) A
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_NO, PAYER_ID, ORD_NO, PAY_STUS, PAY_TP, ORD_AMT, DLV_FEE, CPN_ISS_NO, ORGN_PAY_AMT, PNT_USE_AMT, REAL_PAY_AMT, REG_DTTM, REGR_ID, UPD_DTTM, UPDR_ID FROM PAY WHERE PAY_NO = #{payNo}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PAY_DTTM , SUM(ORGN_PAY_AMT) AS TOT_PAY_AMT FROM PAY WHERE REG_DTTM >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY PAY_DTTM
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY SET PAY_STUS = #{payStus}, UPD_DTTM = NOW(), UPDR_ID = #{updrId} WHERE PAY_NO = (SELECT MIN_PAY_NO FROM (SELECT MIN(PAY_NO) AS MIN_PAY_NO FROM PAY WHERE ORD_NO = #{ordNo} AND PAY_STUS NOT IN (20, 30)) AS TMP)
